name: Indie Game: Payback
description:
My entry for the MFGG Gangame Jam 5

The theme was 7th generation console games and I remembered about Indie Game: The Movie and the splash indie titles started to have back then. This is a humble rendition to those years and to Super Meat Boy specially.

 *** PLOT ***

Indie Game: The Movie ruined the lives of a group of developers.

Now they seek revenge against their protagonists.
